327530.name: Awesomenauts - Wraithlord Scoop Skin
327530.description:
Once an avatar of Justice itself, Wraithlord Scoop is the twisted resurrection of a once benevolent warrior. On his new dark path this once noble spirit has now been consumed by an unending vengeance. Ancient prophecies have been discovered that speak of the Wraithlord's legendary dark weapon, Doomblade. It is said that unless a being of pure spirit exorcises this Doomblade, the dark powers within it resurrect the Wraithlord each time he is slain...

This DLC contains a custom skin for the Scoop of Justice in Awesomenauts. You need to have the Scoop of Justice available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!
327530.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
